name: hopoverfear
0:
”Alexa, open hop over fear”
”Alexa, ask hop over fear for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start hop over fear”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hop over fear
des: Listen to the latest talks from your hop over fear. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
